Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png'}
{3: 'Who—Where—When? Why is everything dark?'}
{3: 'Is this what death feels like?'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Commandant!'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'CPR, second cycle! Two! One! Shock!'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'Celica! Think of something!'}
{3: "Everyone's voices flutter around your ear. Close at times, far at times."}
{3: 'In the middle of your trance, you seem to hear a faint...'}
{3: 'Hello there, friend.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory200.png'}
{3: 'Like I said, hello there, friend.'}
{3: 'This should be the last message. What is before me is death.'}
{3: "After this, there likely won't be someone with the leisure to leave an infinite message loop on the public channels."}
{3: "I'm a coward, a scoundrel—it's why I knew from the beginning that I might not walk to the end of my path."}
{3: "I'm a coward, a scoundrel—even so, I'm leaving a final message... Three voice recordings, to loop infinitely and play on all channels."}
{3: "To avoid the Ascendants, I've limited the power of the signal transmission to a small range, and it is also masked. Sorry if you took it for the ravings of a madman."}
{3: 'When the future of the Ascension-Network collapsed before my eyes, I knew that I had no choice but to tell others what I knew.'}
{3: "Shark-speare, the last resort, is probably no longer under my control anymore. I'll likely be devoured by it, and turned into mulch to make Heteromers."}
{3: "But, it's okay. My knowledge is hidden in the sixth section of my spine. It's not something that can be destroyed by its teeth."}
{3: "I will die here. So I leave everything to you. I'm not a good person, but may humanity find this ember that I leave."}
{3: 'My friend.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory199.png'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: 'CPR, tenth cycle! Two! One! Shock!', 4: '2'}
{3: 'Warmth, tactile touch. Pain—from electric shock.'}
{3: 'And pain, from the wound caused by the adrenaline injection in your chest.'}
{3: 'Air rushes into your lungs. Colors return to your vision.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Commandant, Commandant!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'The heartbeat... is back...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'Commandant! Can you see me? Can you move?', 4: '2'}
{2: "...You're squishing my hand.", 3: '37'}
{3: 'Everyone helps you up, and what meets your eyes is—'}
{3: 'Vera, fighting with Gabriel afar. Karenina, Camu, and the others are trying to stop the Corrupted from closing in.'}
{3: 'And in the middle of the plaza is a huge, child-like statue of a cartoonish shark...'}
{3: "Shark-speare, the last resort, is probably no longer under my control anymore. I'll likely be devoured by it, and turned into mulch to make Heteromers."}
{3: "But, it's okay. My knowledge is hidden in the sixth section of my spine. It's not something that can be destroyed by its teeth."}
{2: 'Everyone, prepare for battle.', 3: '45'}
{2: 'I will continue to command.', 3: '46'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: "Commandant! You're in a dangerous physical condition now...!", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'You need only say it, Commandant, and I will make it happen!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'I pulled the surveillance records from the main plaza...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'A dark figure... swallowed Shome and retreated into the bionic statue projection.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'Commandant, I admire and respect your desire to command, but do know that I will keep monitoring your physical condition.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Thanks.'}
